name: Curry Leaf Indian Restaurant
description: A modern Indian eatery in Raleigh, Curry Leaf offers a vibrant menu of classic curries, tandoori specialties, and fresh naan, all served in a casual, welcoming setting perfect for families and friends.
best_customer_review: Top-notch quality and great variety on the menu.
worst_customer_review: The ambiance was noisy and uncomfortable.

name: Tamarind Indian Cuisine
description: Known for its authentic North and South Indian dishes, Tamarind Indian Cuisine is a favorite for its flavorful biryanis, dosas, and a wide selection of vegetarian and vegan options. The warm, contemporary atmosphere makes it ideal for both casual dining and special occasions.
best_customer_review: The best Indian food I've had in the area. Friendly staff and great ambiance.
worst_customer_review: The ambiance was noisy and uncomfortable.

name: Chola Indian Cuisine
description: Chola Indian Cuisine brings the rich flavors of India to Raleigh with a menu that highlights regional specialties and chef-inspired creations. Its inviting decor and live music nights make it a unique spot for food lovers.
features: Live music, Gluten-free options, Wheelchair accessible
best_customer_review: A hidden gem with amazing spices and perfect cooking.
worst_customer_review: Overpriced for the quality offered. Not worth the visit.

name: Sitar Indian Cuisine
description: Sitar is a Raleigh staple serving up classic Indian comfort food in a cozy, intimate setting. The menu features a range of curries, tandoori dishes, and freshly baked breads, with attentive service and convenient parking.
features: Cozy ambiance, Takeout available, Parking available
best_customer_review: Absolutely loved the flavors and the authentic taste! Highly recommend.
worst_customer_review: The food was bland and lacked the authentic taste.

name: Biryani Pot
description: Biryani Pot in Durham is renowned for its aromatic biryanis and flavorful curries, offering a romantic setting with craft cocktails and late-night hours for those craving authentic Indian cuisine after dark.
features: Romantic setting, Craft cocktails, Late night service
best_customer_review: Exceptional service and delicious dishes. Will definitely come back!
worst_customer_review: The ambiance was noisy and uncomfortable.

name: Taste of India
description: Taste of India in Cary is a casual dining destination with a diverse menu, including a popular kids menu and plenty of free parking. It's a go-to spot for families looking for hearty, flavorful Indian meals.
features: Casual dining, Kids menu, Free parking
best_customer_review: Absolutely loved the flavors and the authentic taste! Highly recommend.
worst_customer_review: The food was bland and lacked the authentic taste.

name: Swagat Indian Cuisine
description: Swagat Indian Cuisine in Morrisville offers a modern twist on traditional Indian fare. With a stylish interior, happy hour specials, and a menu full of crowd-pleasers, it's a great choice for both lunch and dinner.
features: Modern decor, Happy hour, Reservation recommended
best_customer_review: Top-notch quality and great variety on the menu.
worst_customer_review: Had to wait too long for the food, and it was cold when served.

name: BLR Bar & Curry
description: BLR Bar & Curry specializes in authentic Indian and vegetarian cuisine, offering a BYOB policy and group seating for parties and gatherings. The lively atmosphere makes it a popular spot for celebrations.
best_customer_review: Exceptional service and delicious dishes. Will definitely come back!
worst_customer_review: Service was slow and the staff seemed uninterested.

name: Triangles Biryani Indian Restaurant
description: Triangles Biryani in Morrisville is known for its fast service and affordable prices. With a focus on biryanis and classic Indian street food, it's a favorite for quick lunches and convenient delivery.
features: Fast service, Affordable prices, Delivery available
best_customer_review: Absolutely loved the flavors and the authentic taste! Highly recommend.
worst_customer_review: The food was bland and lacked the authentic taste.

name: Naga's South Indian Cuisine
description: Naga's South Indian Cuisine brings traditional recipes and a cozy atmosphere to Morrisville. The friendly staff and authentic dosas, idlis, and sambar make it a must-visit for lovers of South Indian food.
features: Traditional recipes, Friendly staff, Cozy atmosphere
best_customer_review: Exceptional service and delicious dishes. Will definitely come back!
worst_customer_review: The food was bland and lacked the authentic taste.

name: JP's Biryani
description: JP's Biryani is a hotspot for those seeking spicy dishes, a well-stocked buffet, and catering services for events. Their signature biryani is a local favorite.
best_customer_review: Exceptional service and delicious dishes. Will definitely come back!
worst_customer_review: The ambiance was noisy and uncomfortable.

name: Royale Curry
description: Royale Curry in Cary is a vegetarian-friendly restaurant using organic ingredients and offering a relaxing environment for diners looking for healthy, flavorful Indian cuisine.
features: Vegetarian friendly, Organic ingredients, Relaxing environment
best_customer_review: A hidden gem with amazing spices and perfect cooking.
worst_customer_review: The food was bland and lacked the authentic taste.

name: Cilantro Indian Café
description: A family-owned, award-winning restaurant, Cilantro Indian Café serves a seasonal menu of Indian favorites. Its friendly service and cozy setting make it a local favorite.
best_customer_review: Absolutely loved the flavors and the authentic taste! Highly recommend.
worst_customer_review: Had to wait too long for the food, and it was cold when served.

name: Saffron Indian Cuisine
description: Saffron Indian Cuisine offers pet-friendly outdoor patio seating and live sports on TV, making it a great spot for both foodies and sports fans in Cary.
features: Pet friendly, Outdoor patio, Live sports
best_customer_review: Top-notch quality and great variety on the menu.
worst_customer_review: The ambiance was noisy and uncomfortable.

name: Naan House Indian Bistro
description: Naan House Indian Bistro in Apex is dedicated to comfort food made with local ingredients. With daily specials and a welcoming vibe, it’s perfect for a casual meal or a quick bite.
features: Comfort food, Local ingredients, Daily specials
best_customer_review: Exceptional service and delicious dishes. Will definitely come back!
worst_customer_review: Overpriced for the quality offered. Not worth the visit.

name: Bawarchi Grill & Spirits
description: Bawarchi Grill & Spirits offers upscale Indian dining in Apex, featuring an extensive wine list, private dining rooms, and a menu that balances traditional flavors with modern flair.
features: Upscale dining, Extensive wine list, Private dining
best_customer_review: Absolutely loved the flavors and the authentic taste! Highly recommend.
worst_customer_review: The ambiance was noisy and uncomfortable.

name: Chhote's Indian Street Food
description: Chhote's Indian Street Food in Garner serves up classic Indian street snacks and quick bites in a casual, lively setting. Free WiFi and a late-night menu make it a popular hangout.
features: Casual atmosphere, Late night menu, Free WiFi
best_customer_review: A hidden gem with amazing spices and perfect cooking.
worst_customer_review: Had to wait too long for the food, and it was cold when served.

name: Sangam Mart
description: Sangam Mart is a budget-friendly Indian eatery and market in Morrisville, known for its spicy street food, quick service, and convenient location for a fast, delicious meal.
location: 10300 Chapel Hill Rd Ste 600, Morrisville, NC 27560
best_customer_review: Top-notch quality and great variety on the menu.
worst_customer_review: Had to wait too long for the food, and it was cold when served.
